mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_code empCode, e.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, e.rank_code rankCode, e.emp_profile profile, e.emp_id empId, e.emp_kor_name korName, e.emp_reg_no regNo, e.emp_phone phone FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON e.team_code = t.team_code WHERE e.emp_code = #{empCode}
